data.question: What is the empirical formula of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
At what temperature does the material decomposition of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni start?
What is the CO2 uptake of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni at 400 ppm and 298 K?
Is NbOFFIVE-1-Ni stable in water?
data.answer: Yes, it shows exceptional water stability.

data.question: What is the CO2 heat of adsorption for NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
Does NbOFFIVE-1-Ni adsorb N2 at cryogenic temperatures?
data.answer: No, it does not adsorb N2 at cryogenic temperatures.

data.question: What is the CO2/N2 selectivity of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni under dry and humid conditions?
data.answer: It exhibits excellent CO2/N2 selectivity under both dry and humid conditions.

data.question: Can NbOFFIVE-1-Ni be fully regenerated?
data.answer: Yes, it offers complete CO2 desorption at 328 K under vacuum.

data.question: What is the role of fluorine centers in NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: The fluorine centers enhance CO2-framework interactions and subsequently the CO2 selectivity at very low CO2 concentrations.

data.question: Is NbOFFIVE-1-Ni tolerant to hydrogen sulfide?
data.answer: Yes, it shows excellent tolerance to hydrogen sulfide.

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
What is the CO2 uptake of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni at 1000 ppm?
Does the presence of humidity significantly alter the CO2 breakthrough time of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: No, the presence of humidity does not significantly alter the CO2 breakthrough time.

data.question: What is the CO2 adsorption capacity of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni in 1 day at 1000 ppm?
data.answer: It offers the highest CO2 capacity in 1 day at 1000 ppm compared to other evaluated sorbents.

data.question: Can NbOFFIVE-1-Ni simultaneously adsorb water and CO2?
data.answer: Yes, it can simultaneously adsorb water and CO2 without jeopardizing its carbon capture capabilities.

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of NiNbOF5(pyr)2·0.84(CO2)?
What is the weight loss percentage of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni between 20 °C and 280 °C?
Is the framework of NbOFFIVE-1-Ni intact over a range of humidity levels?
data.answer: Yes, the framework remains intact over a range of humidity levels.

data.question: What is the role of the periodically aligned fluorine moieties in NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: They are directly correlated to the strength of the CO2 interactions with the host framework.

data.question: Does NbOFFIVE-1-Ni maintain its crystallinity over the explored temperature range of 25–400 °C?
data.answer: Yes, it retains its crystallinity over the explored temperature range.
